Text: Thank you! You provide a much-appreciated service to all of us in the world who can't get Sky coverage.

Many thanks. SkyF1 coverage almost makes me want to live in the UK. Actually, living in the UK would be a huge improvement over where I live now, but I can't afford the move.

Anyway, thanks again, mate. I'm looking forward to Monaco in two weeks.
Just wanted to say thank you for doing this.
Hahaha! I'm with sewalk, NBC Sports Network in the US is a joke compared to SSF1HD. Thanks to you I can enjoy the proper commentary that F1 deserves. Thanks, smcgill1969!
